3: Your consciousness drifts in hazy darkness as if dreaming an endless dream.
In the dream, there are many blurry figures and loud noises.
The singular blackness is replaced by the red of an unending flame.
Loud noises explode by your ears, almost shattering your eardrum.
In the next moment, all voices disappear. The space is so quiet that you almost cannot hear your own breaths and heartbeats.
The blurred figures start to clear up.
They are Simon, and Hans, and the Constructs that have taken part in the mission in the Pulia Forest Park Ruins, and the many, many Constructs that you could not save in the past.
They are saying something to you, but you cannot hear it now.
They salute you, at the end of all endings, before fading into the darkness.
The darkness removes your sense of space, but you can still feel nausea from getting a concussion.
A ripple appears in the darkness.
A pink light glistens in the dark, slowly approaching, stopping right before you.
Yet it lasted so briefly. So fleeting that you wonder if you were under an illusion.
There is nothing after that glow. Everything begins to be devoured by the darkness...
